title: Screw Attack Doesn't Matter, Is Dead - Kinda Funny vs. Screw Attack SGC 2016
description:
Kinda Funny's going to RTX, and while we're there, we're going to crush Screw Attack, Stuttering Chris, and SGC Saturday night.

Watch Screw Attack's horrible video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NguifVYe0As

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Firesong by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
Source: http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?isrc=USUAN1100598
Artist: http://incompetech.com/

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.
